operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE regular_project_store_info_month SET report_year=?,report_month=?,customer_id=?,customer_name=?,busi_license_no=?,project_name=?,amount=?,fee_rate=?,fee_type=?,fee_describe=?,time_limit=?,time_unit=?,month_num=?,progress=?,conucil_finish_date=?,council_type=?,full_sign=?,contract_status=?,credit_status=? WHERE report_date=? AND project_code=?

operation.name: findByPrimary
operation.sql: SELECT * FROM regular_project_store_info_month WHERE report_date=? AND project_code=?
